description:
A new kind of battle of abilities for a new generation is about to begin! It all started on a regular morning like any other. Akira Shiroyanagi is a high school kid who loves nothing more than konpeito candy and games. One day, he ends up in a fight due to a mysterious girl named Mion. Mion then tells the people she had gathered that they no longer officially exist in any records. They were given powers and were about to be test subjects. Akira makes up his mind to use his powers to climb up the ranks and then crush this organization.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ศึกเดือด 5 วิ พลิกชะตา

tags.name: Death Game
tags.description: Features characters participating in a game, where failure results in death.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

node.description:
__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

__Height:__ 153 cm
__Agency:__ Racoon Dog

[Profile (Racoon Dog)](https://www.raccoon-dog.co.jp/talent/r09-kitou.html
) | [Official Site](https://kitoakari.com/) | [Twitter (Official)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [Twitter (Personal)](https://twitter.com/kitoakari_1016/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/kitoakari_staff/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCU_E2DHcyQu-Toohyd1vzRw)

A Japanese voice actress. She debuted in 2014, got her first main role in *Time Bokan 24* (2016), and has since received more leading roles. On October 16, 2019, her 25th birthday, she made her debut as a solo music artist under Pony Canyon. After the agency Pro-Fit shut down their operations, she joined the new agency Racoon Dog on 2022. 

**Non anime roles:**
- [Abukuma](https://anilist.co/character/228251/Abukuma), Hass, Isuzu, and Nagara - Azur Lane (VG)
- [Barbara](https://anilist.co/character/203315/Barbara-Pegg) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Silence](https://anilist.co/character/186429/Silence) - Arknights (VG)
- Rola - Shadowverse (VG)
- Sabrina - Memento Mori (VG)
- Ashley Graham - Resident Evil 4 Remake (VG)
- Pepper - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- [Celine](https://anilist.co/character/305904 ) - Fire Emblem Engage (VG)
**Katsuya Nagahata** is a Japanese animation planner.
Youko Kogawa is a Japanese producer and planner working at Pony Canyon.
